Razor Claw stands up straight, looking toward Prime. "Stay out of this, you=
 are not part of the accused or a viable witness so you have no say in what=
 happens to these deserters."

The mutant wasn't exactly what bots would co=
nsider sane. he was injected with a virus to stabilize his double transform=
ation but was only given one sequence to key upon. Maybe it was the virus, =
maybe it was his injuries, or maybe the former Pred was just sickened by bo=
ts who'd run from a battle and leave thier comrades to suffer the pains of =
battle.

"Now for business I was dealing with you!" he reached out and poke=
d Wolveritron in the chestplate trying to pursue his issues.


  ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
  From: dachande 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent:=
 Thursday, February 01, 2001 1:57 PM
  Subject: Re: Dachande respond or els=
e


  ::Optimus Prime/Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
   
      They had not he=
ard Razor Claw ask them to stop, but they heard him the second time. Prime =
was walking away, but he stopped and came back.
      "Is there something y=
ou need from us?" Prime asked.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: =
CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, February 01=
, 2001 10:22 AM
    Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


    It all star=
ted back when...


       ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: dachand=
e 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40=
 PM
      Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


      ::Eclipse/Wolver=
itron/Ramus::
       
          They had heard the battling and decided to =
run away, they needed no part in the conflict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran =
into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther they exited the base, in beast=
 modes. And headed far away

      So I responded with...
      . 
      Ra=
zor Claw saw the three bots leaving the sceen of the battle and mistook the=
m for escaping alliance members. he mentally reported his actions to Ice an=
d got the go ahead. He chased the three until they were out of the way of t=
he fight. He transformed to robot mode, pulled his sword and confronted the=
m. "You will stop or you will be forced to, your choice."

      Then a few=
 more posts of Razor Claw tracking them until finally Optimus Prime (Razor =
Claw doesn't know enough about Prime to recognise him) Wolveritron, Ramus, =
and Eclipse were finally together. and Razor Claw caught up with them.(I ca=
n't find the cave posting I thought it was those three that were in the sam=
e cave as Vuloise.)

      He aproached the three bots ready for battle and=
 hoping that things won't be ended peacefully

onsor
